amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit ESF assistance to the government of any country that is a party to the International Criminal Court and has not signed an Article 98 agreement to to surrender U.S. nationals to the ICC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nethercutt amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 166 (Roll no. 387).
